name: Radius 1
description: Radius I is a survey of the cultural ecosystem of our region collaboratively curated by Bradbury Art Museum team members Hillary Brooks, Haley Voges, and Garry Holstein. The exhibition, shown in four of BAM’s six galleries, highlights works by 38 artists who live or work within 180 miles in any direction of BAM. This is a digital rendition of the show that is in the physical museum.
